responses.rationale: The segment reports factual information about infections and culling numbers without using intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
The segment reports factual culling numbers across the nation without using intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
The segment reports factual culling numbers for Iowa without using intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
The segment provides factual background information about Iowa's egg production without using intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
The segment provides factual background information about Iowa's turkey production without using intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
The segment describes the mechanism of disease spread without using intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
The segment reports the number of states with confirmed cases without using intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
The segment reports a specific confirmed case without using intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
The segment reports the location of the latest cases without using intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
